actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to encourage bipartisan amendments.

summary.text: Amends Rule XVI (Motions and Amendments) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to make it in order to consider any amendment offered by at least two Members from the majority party and two Members from the minority party to any bill or resolution that does not violate any rule and that is timely submitted to the Committee on Rules.

titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to encourage bipartisan amendments.
